    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AddBooking
    Adds a booking for a customer on a flight with dynamic pricing.
    AddCustomer
    Command to add a new customer to the system.
    AddFlight
    Command to add a new flight with capacity and base price.
    AddFlightWindow
    Add flight window (works with AdminWindow + FlightsPanel).
    AdminWindow
    Admin GUI window displaying tabbed interface for managing flights, customers, and bookings.
    AdvanceDate
    Advances the system date to a new future date.
    AuthService
    Provides authentication and user management services.
    Booking
    Represents a booking made by a customer for a flight.
    BookingDataManager
    Manages persistence of booking records to and from a file.
    BookingsPanel
    Bookings panel for admin or customer.
    CancelBooking
    Cancels a booking and applies a cancellation fee.
    Command
    Interface for executable system commands.
    CommandParser
    Parses user commands and creates corresponding Command objects.
    Customer
    Represents a customer (passenger) in the Flight Booking System.
    CustomerDataManager
    Manages persistence of customer records to and from a file.
    CustomersPanel
    Admin customers panel.
    CustomerWindow
    Customer GUI window with limited features.
    DataManager
    Interface for persistent data management.
    DeactivateCustomer
    Deactivates a customer account (soft delete).
    DeactivateFlight
    Deactivates a flight (soft delete).
    EditBooking
    Short version of UpdateBooking command.
    Flight
    Represents a flight in the flight booking system.
    FlightBookingSystem
    Represents the whole Flight Booking System.
    FlightBookingSystemData
    Factory and coordinator for all data persistence operations.
    FlightBookingSystemException
    Custom exception for the Flight Booking System.
    FlightDataManager
    Manages persistence of Flight data to/from file storage.
    FlightsPanel
    Flights list panel.
    GuiAuthMenu
    GUI Authentication Menu.
    GuiAuthService
    GUI-side authentication service.
    GuiSession
    Holds session information for authenticated GUI users.
    Help
    Displays the help message with all available commands.
    ListCustomers
    Command to list all active customers in the system.
    ListFlights
    Displays all active flights in the system.
    LoadGUI
    Loads the GUI version of the application.
    LoginWindow
    GUI login screen for user authentication.
    Main
    Entry point for the Flight Booking System command-line interface.
    MainWindow
     
    MyDetailsPanel
    Shows current logged-in customer's details.
    ReactivateCustomer
    Reactivates a previously deactivated customer account.
    ReactivateFlight
    Reactivates a previously deactivated flight.
    Role
    Represents user roles in the system.
    ShowCustomer
    Command to show detailed information about a customer.
    ShowFlight
    Command to show detailed information about a flight.
    UpdateBooking
    Updates an existing booking from one flight to another with dynamic pricing.
    User
    Represents a system user.
    UserDataManager
    Manages persistence of user accounts to and from a file.
